foreignData.flavorText: Geschmiedet aus dem, was auf ihm geschmiedet wird.
foreignData.name: Ähnlichkeitsamboss
foreignData.text:
Einprägen — Wenn der Ähnlichkeitsamboss ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Karte aus deiner Hand außer einem Land ins Exil schicken.
Zaubersprüche, die du wirkst und die mit der ins Exil geschickten Karte einen Kartentyp gemeinsam haben, kosten beim Wirken {2} weniger.

foreignData.name: Yunque de apariencia
foreignData.text:
Estampa — Cuando el Yunque de apariencia entre al campo de batalla, puedes exiliar una carta que no sea tierra de tu mano.
Te cuesta {2} menos lanzar los hechizos que comparten un tipo de carta con la carta exiliada.

foreignData.flavorText: Forgée à partir de ce qu'elle forge.
foreignData.name: Enclume d'apparence
foreignData.text:
Empreinte — Quand l'Enclume d'apparence arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez exiler une carte non-terrain de votre main.
Les sorts que vous lancez qui partagent un type de carte avec la carte exilée coûtent {2} de moins à lancer.

foreignData.flavorText: Forgiato da ciò che lui stesso forgia.
foreignData.name: Incudine dell'Apparenza
foreignData.text:
Imprimere — Quando l'Incudine dell'Apparenza entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi esiliare una carta non terra dalla tua mano.
Le magie che lanci che condividono un tipo di carta con la carta esiliata costano {2} in meno per essere lanciate.

foreignData.flavorText: 鍛錬したものから鍛錬されたもの。
foreignData.name: 類似の金床
foreignData.text:
刻印 ― 類似の金床が戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたの手札にある土地でないカードを１枚追放してもよい。
あなたがその追放されているカードと共通のカード・タイプを持つ呪文を唱えるためのコストは{2}少なくなる。

foreignData.name: Bigorna da Semelhança
foreignData.text:
Estampar — Quando Bigorna da Semelhança entra no campo de batalha, você pode exilar um card que não seja um terreno da sua mão.
As mágicas que você conjurar que tiverem o mesmo tipo de card do card exilado custarão {2} a menos para serem conjuradas.

foreignData.flavorText: Она выкована из того, что на ней куют.
foreignData.name: Наковальня Сходства
foreignData.text:
Отпечаток — Когда Наковальня Сходства выходит на поле битвы, вы можете изгнать не являющуюся землей карту из вашей руки.
Разыгрываемые вами заклинания, у которых есть такой же тип карты, как у изгнанной карты, стоят на {2} меньше.

foreignData.flavorText: 被所铸造的东西铸造出来。
foreignData.name: 近貌铁砧
foreignData.text:
压印～当近貌铁砧进战场时，你可以从你手上放逐一张非地牌。
由你施放、且与所放逐的牌有共通类别的咒语减少{2}来施放。

foreignData.flavorText: 被所鑄造的東西鑄造出來。
foreignData.name: 近貌鐵砧
foreignData.text:
壓印～當近貌鐵砧進戰場時，你可以從你手上放逐一張非地牌。
由你施放、且與所放逐的牌有共通牌類別的咒語減少{2}來施放。

name: Semblance Anvil
originalText:
Imprint — When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

rulings.text: Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.
Spells you cast that share multiple card types with the exiled card still cost just {2} less to cast. They don’t get a greater cost reduction.

Semblance Anvil takes the total cost to cast a spell into account, not just its mana cost. This includes additional costs (such as kicker) and alternative costs (such as evoke). It also includes cost increases from other sources (such as Lodestone Golem’s ability).

Semblance Anvil won’t affect the part of a spell’s cost represented by colored mana symbols. For example, a spell that normally costs {1}{U} to cast would cost {U} if it shared a card type with the exiled card.

Semblance Anvil can reduce the amount you pay for a spell’s cost that includes {X}. For example, Blaze is a sorcery that costs {X}{R}. If the card exiled with Semblance Anvil is a sorcery, and you want to cast Blaze with X equal to 5, you’ll have to pay only {3}{R}. This is true even if the ability states that {X} must be paid with a certain color of mana (as Drain Life does).
Semblance Anvil’s cost reduction effect is mandatory.

text:
Imprint — When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.
